article_title: The Morning Download: CIOs Integrate Wearables Into Core Software Platforms
article_text: Security and regulatory concerns have limited health care providers’ use of offshore IT services, but pressure to reduce costs is prompting them to find ways to leverage the offshore model while safeguarding sensitive data.

twitter.description: Michael Guggemos, CIO of Insight Enterprises, said the integration of wearables into platforms such as Salesforce can create efficiencies in sales and speed up communications among field technicians.
